title: Purchasing RP
body: Hi, I am trying to purchase some RP rn but it's giving me the error " You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts at this time. Please try again in 24 hours". I just bought some RP like 10 mins ago and it worked fine, I'm not sure what it's referring to here.

replies.body: If you're getting that message now it likely means you've either tried and failed too many times, already purchased the limit for a days period, or a combination of the two. At this point, you'll need to wait **the full 24 hours** before trying at all or you can increase the timer. Sit tight, wait a day and a half or 2 just to be safe, and you'll be able to make those purchases again.
